Namespace: util

Playbasis. util

Playbasis Util API

Methods

<static> getThumbnailURL(imageUrl, favored)

Return thumbnail url for different size from the specified original image url.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
imageUrl String

original image url
favored String

size of image to get is url from. It can be "80x80" | "240x240".
Returns:

Promise object

Type
Object
